values: What Happens When You Die? The Dead Will Be Raised ImperishableWhat Happens When You Die? The Dead Will Be Raised Imperishable

God will honor the work of his Son by raising your
      body from the dead, and you will use your body to glorify him forever and ever. 
      God will honor the work of his Son by raising your
    body from the dead, and you will use your body to glorify him forever and ever.
